mapper.sql: select ID, TRANSFER_CODE, BPM_KEY, PROCESS_ID, TRANSFER_TIME, TRANSFER_PERSON_ID, TRANSFER_PERSON_NAME, OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID, IN_WAREHOUSE_ID, DESCRIPTON, STATUS, CREATE_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATOR, UPDATE_DATE, (select t1.WAREHOUSE_NAME from WAREHOUSE t1 where t1.id=OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID) outWarehouseName, (select t2.WAREHOUSE_NAME from WAREHOUSE t2 where t2.id=in_WAREHOUSE_ID) inWarehouseName FROM

#where() #set($_p = $_parameter.condition) #if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.transferCode && $_p.transferCode != '') #set($_transferCode = '%' + $_p.transferCode + '%') AND TRANSFER_CODE LIKE @{_transferCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end
#if($_p.transferTime && $_p.transferTime != '') #set($_transferTime = $_p.transferTime) AND TRANSFER_TIME = @{_transferTime} #end #if($_p.startTransferTime && $_p.startTransferTime != '') #set($_startTransferTime = $_p.startTransferTime) AND TRANSFER_TIME >= @{_startTransferTime} #end #if($_p.endTransferTime && $_p.endTransferTime != '') #set($_endTransferTime = $_p.endTransferTime) AND TRANSFER_TIME <= @{_endTransferTime} #end
#if($_p.transferPersonId && $_p.transferPersonId != '') #set($_transferPersonId = $_p.transferPersonId) AND TRANSFER_PERSON_ID = @{_transferPersonId} #end
#if($_p.transferPersonName && $_p.transferPersonName != '') #set($_transferPersonName = '%' + $_p.transferPersonName + '%') AND TRANSFER_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_transferPersonName} #end #if($_p.outWarehouseId && $_p.outWarehouseId != '') #set($_outWarehouseId = $_p.outWarehouseId) AND OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_outWarehouseId} #end #if($_p.inWarehouseId && $_p.inWarehouseId != '') #set($_inWarehouseId = $_p.inWarehouseId) AND IN_WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_inWarehouseId} #end #if($_p.status && $_p.status != '') #set($_status = $_p.status) AND STATUS = @{_status} #end
#end
mapper.select:
#set($_p = $_parameter.condition) select t.ID, t.TRANSFER_CODE, t.BPM_KEY, t.PROCESS_ID, t.TRANSFER_TIME, t.TRANSFER_PERSON_ID, t.TRANSFER_PERSON_NAME, t.OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID, t.IN_WAREHOUSE_ID, t.DESCRIPTON, t.STATUS, t.CREATE_ID, t.CREATOR, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_ID, t.UPDATOR, t.UPDATE_DATE, (select t1.WAREHOUSE_NAME from WAREHOUSE t1 where t1.id=t.OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID) outWarehouseName, (select t2.WAREHOUSE_NAME from WAREHOUSE t2 where t2.id=t.in_WAREHOUSE_ID) inWarehouseName, t3.ENUM_TEXT statusName FROM TRANSFER t left join ENUM_DETAIL t3 on t.STATUS=t3.ENUM_VALUE and t3.TYPE_ID= @{_p.statusDictType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
#where()
#if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND t.ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.transferCode && $_p.transferCode != '') #set($_transferCode = '%' + $_p.transferCode + '%') AND t.TRANSFER_CODE LIKE @{_transferCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND t.BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND t.PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end
#if($_p.transferTime && $_p.transferTime != '') #set($_transferTime = $_p.transferTime) AND t.TRANSFER_TIME = @{_transferTime} #end #if($_p.startTransferTime && $_p.startTransferTime != '') #set($_startTransferTime = $_p.startTransferTime) AND t.TRANSFER_TIME >= @{_startTransferTime} #end #if($_p.endTransferTime && $_p.endTransferTime != '') #set($_endTransferTime = $_p.endTransferTime) AND t.TRANSFER_TIME <= @{_endTransferTime} #end
#if($_p.transferPersonId && $_p.transferPersonId != '') #set($_transferPersonId = $_p.transferPersonId) AND t.TRANSFER_PERSON_ID = @{_transferPersonId} #end
#if($_p.transferPersonName && $_p.transferPersonName != '') #set($_transferPersonName = '%' + $_p.transferPersonName + '%') AND t.TRANSFER_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_transferPersonName} #end #if($_p.outWarehouseId && $_p.outWarehouseId != '') #set($_outWarehouseId = $_p.outWarehouseId) AND t.OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_outWarehouseId} #end #if($_p.inWarehouseId && $_p.inWarehouseId != '') #set($_inWarehouseId = $_p.inWarehouseId) AND t.IN_WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_inWarehouseId} #end #if($_p.status && $_p.status != '') #set($_status = $_p.status) AND t.STATUS = @{_status} #end #end
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.ID DESC")

#set($_p = $_parameter.condition) select t.ID, t.TRANSFER_CODE, t.BPM_KEY, t.PROCESS_ID, t.TRANSFER_TIME, t.TRANSFER_PERSON_ID, t.TRANSFER_PERSON_NAME, t.OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID, t.IN_WAREHOUSE_ID, t.DESCRIPTON, t.STATUS, t.CREATE_ID, t.CREATOR, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_ID, t.UPDATOR, t.UPDATE_DATE, (select t1.WAREHOUSE_NAME from WAREHOUSE t1 where t1.id=t.OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID) outWarehouseName, (select t2.WAREHOUSE_NAME from WAREHOUSE t2 where t2.id=t.in_WAREHOUSE_ID) inWarehouseName, t3.ENUM_TEXT statusName
#order($_parameter.condition,"t.ID DESC")
FROM TRANSFER t left join ENUM_DETAIL t3 on t.STATUS=t3.ENUM_VALUE and t3.TYPE_ID= @{_p.statusDictType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
#where()
#if($_p.id && $_p.id != '') #set($_id = $_p.id) AND t.ID LIKE @{_id} #end #if($_p.transferCode && $_p.transferCode != '') #set($_transferCode = '%' + $_p.transferCode + '%') AND t.TRANSFER_CODE LIKE @{_transferCode} #end #if($_p.bpmKey && $_p.bpmKey != '') #set($_bpmKey = '%' + $_p.bpmKey + '%') AND t.BPM_KEY LIKE @{_bpmKey} #end #if($_p.processId && $_p.processId != '') #set($_processId = $_p.processId) AND t.PROCESS_ID = @{_processId} #end

#if($_p.transferPersonName && $_p.transferPersonName != '') #set($_transferPersonName = '%' + $_p.transferPersonName + '%') AND t.TRANSFER_PERSON_NAME LIKE @{_transferPersonName} #end #if($_p.outWarehouseId && $_p.outWarehouseId != '') #set($_outWarehouseId = $_p.outWarehouseId) AND t.OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_outWarehouseId} #end #if($_p.inWarehouseId && $_p.inWarehouseId != '') #set($_inWarehouseId = $_p.inWarehouseId) AND t.IN_WAREHOUSE_ID = @{_inWarehouseId} #end #if($_p.status && $_p.status != '') #set($_status = $_p.status) AND t.STATUS = @{_status} #end #end

select a.ID, a.TRANSFER_CODE, a.BPM_KEY, a.PROCESS_ID, a.TRANSFER_TIME, a.TRANSFER_PERSON_ID, a.TRANSFER_PERSON_NAME, a.OUT_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.IN_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.DESCRIPTON, a.STATUS, a.CREATE_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_ID, a.UPDATOR, a.UPDATE_DATE, b.ID d_ID, b.TRANSFER_ID d_TRANSFER_ID, b.SPARE_ID d_SPARE_ID, b.QUANTITY d_QUANTITY, b.AVAILABLE_QTY d_AVAILABLE_QTY, c.spare_Code d_SPARE_CODE, c.spare_Name d_SPARE_NAME, c.spec d_SPEC, c.model d_MODEL from TRANSFER a left join TRANSFER_DETAIL b on a.ID = b.TRANSFER_ID LEFT JOIN SPARE c on c.id=b.SPARE_ID WHERE a.ID = @{_parameter, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
